official_title: A bill to prohibit operations by the Coast Guard in the Persian Gulf region.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating, notwithstanding any other law, from authorizing the use of any resources of the Coast Guard to carry out activities in the Persian Gulf region, other than activities which were carried out during the one-year period ending April 26, 1988.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit operations by the Coast Guard in the Persian Gulf region.
